original_text: And Jacob did separate the lambs, and set the faces of the flocks toward the ringstraked, and all the brown in the flock of Laban; and he put his own flocks by themselves, and put them not unto Laban's cattle.
korean_text: 야곱이 새끼 양을 구분하고 그 얼룩무늬와 검은 빛 있는 것을 라반의 양과 서로 마주보게 하며 자기 양을 따로 두어 라반의 양과 섞이지 않게 하며

sentences.original_text: And Jacob did separate the lambs
and set the faces of the flocks
and all the brown in the flock of Laban
sentences.korean_translation: 라반의 양 떼 중 모든 갈색 것들을 향하였고

sentences.original_text: and he put his own flocks by themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 양 떼를 따로 두었으며

sentences.original_text: and put them not unto Laban's cattle
